trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a custom user-defined line cap.
trans-unit.target: 封裝自訂的使用者定義線條端點。

trans-unit.source: Line caps are used at the beginnings and ends of lines or curves drawn by GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> objects.
trans-unit.target: 線條端點可用來在開頭和結束的線條或曲線 GDI + 中繪製<xref:System.Drawing.Pen>物件。

trans-unit.source: GDI+ supports several predefined cap styles, and also allows users to define their own cap styles.
trans-unit.target: GDI + 支援數個預先定義的端點樣式，並可允許使用者定義自己的端點樣式。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to create custom cap styles.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用來建立自訂的端點樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何使用 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> 類別。

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste, the code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中貼上]、 [Windows Form 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `DrawCaps` from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawCaps`從表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> class with the specified outline and fill.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的外框和填滿，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object that defines the fill for the custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 定義自訂端點填滿的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object that defines the outline of the custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 定義自訂端點外框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> class with the specified outline and fill.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的外框和填滿，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> 不論作業指定的填滿模式中使用 「 線圈"填滿的模式。

trans-unit.source: The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time.
trans-unit.target: `fillPath`和`strokePath`參數不能在相同的時間。

trans-unit.source: One parameter must be passed a null value.
trans-unit.target: 一個參數必須傳遞 null 值。

trans-unit.source: If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果上述其中一個參數傳遞 null 值，`fillPath`會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果`strokePath`是`null`，`fillPath`應該攔截負 y 軸。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼在 Windows Form 中的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `DrawCaps` from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawCaps`從表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object that defines the fill for the custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 定義自訂端點填滿的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object that defines the outline of the custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 定義自訂端點外框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The line cap from which to create the custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 要建立自訂帽緣的來源直線帽緣。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> class from the specified existing <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> enumeration with the specified outline and fill.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的外框和填滿，從指定的現有 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 列舉型別初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> 不論作業指定的填滿模式中使用 「 線圈"填滿的模式。

trans-unit.source: The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time.
trans-unit.target: `fillPath`和`strokePath`參數不能在相同的時間。

trans-unit.source: One parameter must be passed a null value.
trans-unit.target: 一個參數必須傳遞 null 值。

trans-unit.source: If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果上述其中一個參數傳遞 null 值，`fillPath`會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果`strokePath`是`null`，`fillPath`應該攔截負 y 軸。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object that defines the fill for the custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 定義自訂端點填滿的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object that defines the outline of the custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 定義自訂端點外框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The line cap from which to create the custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 要建立自訂帽緣的來源直線帽緣。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the cap and the line.
trans-unit.target: 端點和線條之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> class from the specified existing <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> enumeration with the specified outline, fill, and inset.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的外框、填滿和內凹，從指定的現有 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 列舉型別初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> uses a fill mode of "winding" regardless of the fill mode specified for the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> 不論作業指定的填滿模式中使用 「 線圈"填滿的模式。

trans-unit.source: The `fillPath` and `strokePath` parameters cannot be used at the same time.
trans-unit.target: `fillPath`和`strokePath`參數不能在相同的時間。

trans-unit.source: One parameter must be passed a null value.
trans-unit.target: 一個參數必須傳遞 null 值。

trans-unit.source: If neither parameter is passed a null value, `fillPath` will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果上述其中一個參數傳遞 null 值，`fillPath`會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If `strokePath` is `null`, `fillPath` should intercept the negative y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果`strokePath`是`null`，`fillPath`應該攔截負 y 軸。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> enumeration on which this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> is based.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> 所根據的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> enumeration on which this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> is based.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> 列舉型別，這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 所根據的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between the cap and the line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定端點和線條之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the beginning of the cap and the end of the line.
trans-unit.target: 端點開端和線條末端之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 的完全相同複本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> this method creates, cast as an object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所建立的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" />，其轉型為物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件物件。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a custom line cap by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: 藉由建立自訂的線條端點<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> object, `firstCap`,using the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object just created.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap>物件`firstCap`，並使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>剛才建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a clone of `firstCap` by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立的複製品`firstCap`使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap.Clone%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets up the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomStartCap%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomEndCap%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> object, and uses that pen to draw a line and the custom caps to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomStartCap%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Pen.CustomEndCap%2A>屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Pen>物件，並使用該畫筆螢幕上繪製一條線和自訂端點。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 物件使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>允許所使用的資源<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap>都重新配置用於其他用途的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: Allows an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在記憶體回收 (GC) 回收 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 前，允許 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 嘗試釋放資源並執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> enumeration used at the beginning of a line within this cap.
trans-unit.target: 用於這個端點中線條開端的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> enumeration used at the end of a line within this cap.
trans-unit.target: 用於這個端點中線條末端的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the caps used to start and end lines that make up this custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來起始和結束組成這個自訂端點線條的端點。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap.GetStrokeCaps%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap.GetStrokeCaps%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼在 Windows Form 中的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `DrawCaps` from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawCaps`從表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> enumeration used at the beginning of a line within this cap.
trans-unit.target: 用於這個端點中線條開端的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> enumeration used at the end of a line within this cap.
trans-unit.target: 用於這個端點中線條末端的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap" /> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Sets the caps used to start and end lines that make up this custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 設定用來起始和結束組成這個自訂端點線條的端點。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap.SetStrokeCaps%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap.SetStrokeCaps%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼在 Windows Form 中的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `DrawCaps` from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawCaps`從表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin" /> enumeration that determines how lines that compose this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> object are joined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定判斷組成這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin" /> 物件的線條如何聯結 (Join) 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin" /> enumeration this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> object uses to join lines.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin" /> 列舉型別，被這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 物件用來聯結線條。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin> enumeration that is used to join lines and curves that make up the stroked path of this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指定<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin>用於聯結的直線和曲線的繪製的路徑所組成的列舉型別<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which to scale this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> Class object with respect to the width of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定縮放與 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap" /> 物件寬度相關的這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> 類別物件的數量。

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to scale the cap.
trans-unit.target: 要縮放端點的數量。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the multiple of the pen width by which to multiply the size of the custom cap.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性指定多個要相乘的自訂端點大小的畫筆寬度。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property equals 1, the custom cap width is 10, the custom cap height is 5, and a line is drawn with a pen with a width of 3, then the cap is drawn 30 units wide and 15 units high.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果此屬性值等於 1，自訂端點寬度為 10、 自訂端點高度為 5，而且在寬度為 3 畫筆繪製線條，然後為繪製 30 單位寬度和 15 單位的高度。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to 3 causes the cap to be drawn 90 units wide and 45 units high.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為 3 會將端點會繪製 90 單位的寬度和 45 單位的高度。
